features: CREATIVITY BEYOND IMAGINATION - The 1" magnetic puzzle cube sensory toy construction building block features easy click and collect magnetized connectors hidden in the magnet bricks to allow intuitive play and fun educational STEM skill learning experiences. Facilitate problem solving and fine motor skills, spatial reasoning, logic training, critical thinking, hand-eye coordination, and child brain development, by promoting creativity. If you can imagine it, you can build it and create it!

EXPLODED VIEW IDEA BOOK INCLUDED - The magnetic building cube toy set includes 50 detailed colorful instructions for constructing wacky characters, submarines, dinosaurs, snails, trucks, boat captains, watering pots, and more! Never run out of ideas with the colorfully illustrated ideabook that can help children stimulate fun creations and enhance creativity by flipping through each page! Explore endless possibilities of 3D model designs and learn how to create models of their favorite character

OPEN-ENDED POSSIBILITIES, LEARNING IS FUN - Featuring 6 different bright colored magnetic educational sensory cubes, this toy kit helps early development of children's STEAM skills and gain a strong visual sense of color, arts, geometrical shapes, number counting, critical thinking, 3D architectural design and structural engineering for preschool kids, kindergarten child, pretend play, group activity, classroom, toddlers, teamwork boys & girls age 3+ to create unlimited abstract shape creations.

LEARNING BY PLAYING - PicassoTiles has done it again providing an all-in-one experience enabling kids to play intuitively and learn to be artistic, creative, scientific, intelligent, technical, and architecturally sound all at the same time. The magnetic construction puzzle block cube toy kit makes early educational experiences fun and engaging starting with modeling 50+ 2D or 3D animals, airplanes, dinosaurs and much more as shown in the exploded view instruction cards included with the toyset!

ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT - Enjoyable for single or multiple parties to fulfill the sense of achievement together. Magnetic Construction blocks are BPA-FREE, NON-TOXIC, and suitable for all ages (3+ and up). Build from any side of the magical magnet building block for unlimited designs. Creating in groups and challenging each other to design something special is a great way to spend quality time with loved ones. Let your imagination run wild and inspire others to construct amazing creations too!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STRONG MAGNETIC CUBES Build from any side of the magical magnetic building block for endless creations. Creating in groups and challenging each other to design something special is a great way to spend quality time with loved ones. Let your imagination run wild and inspire others to construct amazing creations too! EXPLOSIVE VIEW INSTRUCTIONS Release the children from digital screens and electronic devices such as TV, gaming, smartphone or tablets and finally bring some peace and quiet time back to the house. This puzzle comes with thousands of possibilities to promote critical thinking, develop kids creativity and stimulate STEAM (science, technology, engineering, art and mathematics) skills. Make your child's preschool and creative learning experience trouble-free and fun with engaging hands-on play. FREE IDEABOOK with 50+ ideas included! PicassoTiles has done it again providing an all-in-one experience enabling kids to play intuitively and learn to be artistic, creative, scientific, intelligent, technical, and architecturally sound all at the same time. The magnetic construction puzzle block cube toy kit makes early education experience fun and engaging starting with modeling 50+ 2D or 3D animals, airplanes, dinosaurs and more as shown in the FREE idea book included. CREATIVITY BEYOND IMAGINATION The 1" magnetic puzzle cube sensory toy construction building block features click and collect magnetized connectors hidden in the building bricks to allow intuitive play and fun educational STEM skill learning experiences. Facilitate problem solving and fine motor skills, spatial reasoning, logic training, critical thinking, hand-eye coordination, and child brain development, by promoting creativity. If you can imagine it, you can build it and make it possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great creative toy for kids
reviews.reviewText: These magnetic blocks are great. They snap together regardless of which way they are oriented. The magnets are just strong enough to keep the blocks together and build things, but very easy to take apart. The kids enjoy making structures and people (and especially "cookies" which is what they call 4×4 squares).Highly recommend these for imaginative play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pleased, would buy again
reviews.reviewText: Magnets are not as strong as what might be for a magnetic tile, but strong enough for its purpose as a puzzle. Bright colors fun toy. Bought for my OCC boxes. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son absolutely loves these. They are so fun. They do not work with other brands however. But all in all they are amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for entertaining toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old has been playing with a set of these for over a year and he absolutely loves them! You can build all kinds of cool designs and buildings. They stick together really well. They are fairly durable and only a few of them have a few cracks in the plastic after over a year of play. We decided to get him more so that he can build even bigger things!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use, I like them more than the tiles
reviews.reviewText: These things are neat! I got this during the prime day sale and needed some toys that would entertain a group or kiddos during a family gathering. I wanted something that they could all participate in together so there wasn’t any fighting over toys so I chose these and a box of magnet tiles. Well… my plan didn’t work as well as I’d like because these were such a hit! Everyone wanted to play with these. It’s so simple, yet there’s so many different things you can make. I like that are all the same shape and I find it quite relaxing to play with these. My only two negatives are that I wish there were more in a box and that the magnets aren’t too strong (like keeping a big build together)Overall, would love to order some more to add to the collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small
reviews.reviewText: I liked the multiple puzzle sides and that they are like building blocks that are slightly magnetic, enough to barely stick together. Each block makes a rattling noise which my son loves, like little maracas. Now what I didn't like.... I was shocked at how tiny this puzzle was. In a picture it shows it filling a child's hand... That would have to be a baby, plus blocks can fit into toddlers mouth. Maybe i overlooked description measurements (if there are any, didn't check) i went off the picture. It would make a great stocking stuffer not a birthday gift, i just gave it to my son rather then wrapping as a birthday gift. Its cute just not worth the price, you expect it to be bigger at that price or cheaper at that size. Didn't feel like going threw the return process and it's hard to keep up with the pieces so have to hunt them down. Easily lost bc they don't stick well and are tiny. You turn it with more then 2 blocks it doesn't stay together just falls apart which is odd considering the size.The pictures on it are detailed and colorful. My youngest loves that. But he turns it around after putting a few together (which causes it to fall apart due to weak magnets lol) to see if the other sides line up. They don't so if you have one side put together correctly all the other sides do not match. Then he loses interest. It's durable that's for sure. But painful if a kids throws it and hurts worst then Legos if you step on it lol pointy corners but they are mini blocks. It's a great concept and cute detailed pictures ,just too small, for me and mine, maybe good for the car if you keep up with all the pieces. I really wish it was bigger, am disappointed and wanted to love this bc it's a great toy just needs to be a little bigger. 6 blocks total in a cardboard box. Being that small and blocks hardly stick due to weak magnetics it should be cheaper. I bought it back in September before inflation got too bad. Lower the price and strengthen the magnets a tad and it'll be a 5 star or larger blocks with stronger magnetics then perfect!I hope this helps someone. If you're looking for a little travel puzzle then this is great! But if you think like I did that it's chunky blocks that could stay together after putting a side together think again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend!!! Very “satisfying” to play with. My 7 year old loved and my 11 and pre-k were also interested! Just wish it came with more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun set and good for travel
reviews.reviewText: These 1” magnet cubes and are a good size for my 2 year old to hold and build. She loves the set and plays with them frequently. The set is a good size with 50 blocks. We took them travelling with us and the set kept her busy. It’s nice that the set comes with a booklet with building ideas which was quite helpful. We also use them as counters and my daughter learned to group them into the same colours. The magnets are not super strong but it’s enough to build with 2-3 blocks hanging off one block.Overall, I would recommend this set to others and I also purchased additional sets as gifts.
Mon garcon adore. Les petits et les grands ont beaucoup de plaisir a essayé differentes structures. Nous avons pris la valise de rangement avec, un must.
C' est pour un cadeau, c'est bien mais j'imaginais les cubes beaucoup plus gros
Es un producto de muy buena calidad, pero me hubiera gustado que fuera para más personas.
easier to play and since its magnetic, less chance of falling apart. much happier babies.
